title: Pardonnez moi, Mr. Karsh
creator_credit: Merill Stewart and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The photographer emerges, literally from the street and then, camera at the ready, makes Montreal his studio and the people in the street his subjects. He turns enquiring reporter and provokes scenes that are often fresh, lively and amusing when he asks “Do you think you are normal?”
